question: Which Indian-origin personality has been appointed as the new UNICEF's Global Goodwill Ambassador?
explanation: Lilly Singh, an Indian-origin Canadian YouTube star, has been appointed as the new UNICEF\'s Global Goodwill Ambassador at a special event in New Delhi. As the UNICEF ambassador Lilly will use her channel to showcase the organisation\'s work and urge millions of her followers to work for children\'s rights.
